caption: Great cooking class! Took my granddaughter (Christmas present) when her parents had a family emergency. It was great fun and the meal turned out great. The kids (my granddaughter and the other children in the class) seemed to have fun and actually learned. I plan on going back.

The food here is absolutely delicious. I’ve eaten here multiple times and I’ve not had a bad meal. Initially it may seem a little pricey but you have to remember everything here is made from scratch. Thus the price is fair in my opinion. …
